artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Yorozuya Magobei
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 335.2; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 301.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: portrait of a man with a yellow bundle on his back, wearing a maroon garment with a green patterned belt over a blue kimono with black collar; falling snow; two brown birds flying at top
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From A Barometer of Emotions (Seiu kandankei 情得感檀形)
signed: 応需よしとし筆 {ōju Yoshitoshi hitsu}
title: Light Snowfall: Actor Ichikawa Sadanji I as Obō Kichisa
